pullRequest.body:
I noticed that the following code is surprisingly slow.
``` lean
import Mathlib

count_heartbeats in
example {n : ℕ} : CovariantClass (Fin (n + 1)) (Fin (n + 1)) (· + ·) (· < ·) := by
  try infer_instance
  sorry
```
This PR removed some redundant instances. The heartbeats have dropped from 19118 to 11450 (still too slow).
Lean4 still seems to make some redundant attempts. See also https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/issues/6646#issuecomment-1691792488.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/2830ec8e-7502-45b9-819c-a73f0b9f16d7) for commit a6e645f7c7c8d8c2f2f0b7facb405c6a7c8f1d20.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/125088cf-517c-474c-a1c4-60d4263a1f89/to/2830ec8e-7502-45b9-819c-a73f0b9f16d7) against commit e9fb5b31bb918376a758dec1ff49931062deb8f4:
```diff
  Benchmark                                  Metric         Change
  ================================================================
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.ComposableArrows   instructions     6.1%
```

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/e8ef26f9-eac0-4999-87dd-0e2c745233d8) for commit 1a749e0ff829652853aecae457336ffbeee6cb36.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/125088cf-517c-474c-a1c4-60d4263a1f89/to/e8ef26f9-eac0-4999-87dd-0e2c745233d8) against commit e9fb5b31bb918376a758dec1ff49931062deb8f4:
```diff
  Benchmark                                  Metric         Change
  ================================================================
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.ComposableArrows   instructions     5.3%
```
I'm changing it to `awaiting-author` because it's marked as a draft PR and as a `WIP`. If it's ready for review, then please change it from draft to a normal PR and adjust the labels.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/e6970704-8204-44ea-bc92-629c7f716d72) for commit 45d4cccc28894bf4490178a81ffd4678a0ff11a7.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/6d754346-663a-47ec-93ed-b25174161ea6/to/e6970704-8204-44ea-bc92-629c7f716d72) against commit 3502115bbf882ed91452052c41607a3e5139e1e1.
That's my mathlib3 PR. Considering the slow TC synthesis, it really shouldn't be an instance.

pullRequest.title: chore: remove redundant covariance instances, add priority
